Oasis is the spot! The food is amazing! The service is amazing!!!! Can‚Äôt wait to go back for brunch.

Oasis Caribbean Restaurant Lounge is a true hidden gem! The moment I walked in, I was welcomed by a warm and vibrant atmosphere that made me feel right at home. The food? Absolutely incredible ‚Äî full of authentic Caribbean flavor and cooked to perfection. I had the Rasta pasta, and it was easily one of the best I‚Äôve ever tasted. The drinks were refreshing, and the music added the perfect touch to the experience. Whether you‚Äôre looking for a chill night out or a spot to enjoy great food with friends, this is the place to be. Highly recommend!

Oasis wow, the ambiance, the food, the drinks and staffs amazing. Anytime I want great Oxtail or Curry Goat this is where I go. I like Tuesdays the best because of the Tacos and the deals this place is amazing.

No hookah . It's for crowds 21-25 yrs old

My friend was celebrating her birthday here . It was amazing . The food , drinks , hookah and atmosphere was amazing. That rum punch was punching .
